EmailTemplate.subject: With Love Gala - Reminder to submit your dietary restrictions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Just a reminder that if you have any dietary restrictions, please fill out this form < https://livediff.typeform.com/to/s1WAvz8h?typeform-source=www.google.com > by tomorrow evening, September 29th.
We will be enjoying a delicious chicken breast wellington with brie cheese and cranberry sauce served with potato pave and Chefâ€™s seasonal vegetables.
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
